com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util

Class CredentialUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util.CredentialUtils

  • public final class CredentialUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    CredentialUtils retrieves service credentials from the environment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials
      A util class to easily store service credentials.

    • Method Detail

      • getIAMKey

        public static java.lang.String getIAMKey(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Returns the IAM API key from the VCAP_SERVICES, or null if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the IAM API key or null if the service cannot be found

      • getAPIKey

        public static java.lang.String getAPIKey(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Returns the apiKey from the VCAP_SERVICES or null if doesn't exists.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the API key or null if the service cannot be found.

      • getAPIKey

        public static java.lang.String getAPIKey(java.lang.String serviceName,
                         java.lang.String plan)
        Returns the apiKey from the VCAP_SERVICES or null if doesn't exists. If plan is specified, then only credentials for the given plan will be returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        plan - the service plan: standard, free or experimental
        Returns:
        the API key

      • getUserNameAndPassword

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getUserNameAndPassword(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Returns the username and password as defined in the VCAP_SERVICES or null if they do not exist or are not accessible. This is a utility method for getUserNameAndPassword(String, String). Invoking this method is identical to calling getUserNameAndPassword(serviceName, null);
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose credentials are sought
        Returns:
        an object representing the service's credentials

      • getUserNameAndPassword

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getUserNameAndPassword(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                        java.lang.String plan)
        Returns the username and password as defined in the VCAP_SERVICES or null if they do not exist or are not accessible. If a plan is provided then only the credentials for that plan (and service) will be returned. Null will be returned if the plan does not exist.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose credentials are sought
        plan - the plan name
        Returns:
        an object representing the service's credentials

      • getAPIUrl

        public static java.lang.String getAPIUrl(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Gets the API url.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the API url

      • getAPIUrl

        public static java.lang.String getAPIUrl(java.lang.String serviceName,
                         java.lang.String plan)
        Returns the API URL from the VCAP_SERVICES, JDNI, or null if doesn't exists. If plan is specified, then only credentials for the given plan will be returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        plan - the service plan: standard, free or experimental
        Returns:
        the API URL

      • getIAMUrl

        public static java.lang.String getIAMUrl(java.lang.String serviceName)

      • setServices

        public static void setServices(java.lang.String services)
        Sets the VCAP_SERVICES variable. This is utility variable for testing
        Parameters:
        services - the VCAP_SERVICES

      • setContext

        public static void setContext(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> env)
        Sets the context variable for JDNI. This is a utility method for testing.
        Parameters:
        env - Configuration options for the context

      • getAPIUrlTest

        public static java.lang.String getAPIUrlTest(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Method for testing the getAPIUrl method that bypasses the VCAP services to ensure retrieval from JDNI.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the API URL
